folder_patterns.description: Markdown/MDX pages from the src/pages directory. The double-asterisk preserves subdirectory structures.
Blog posts (Markdown/MDX) for the 'articles' blog instance. Source folder 'blog-articles' is inferred from the i18n structure. The double-asterisk preserves subdirectory structures.
Blog posts (Markdown/MDX) for the 'newsletter' blog instance. Source folder 'blog-newsletter' is inferred from the i18n structure. The double-asterisk preserves subdirectory structures.

Theme translation JSON files from the 'docusaurus-theme-classic' plugin. This pattern assumes 'en' (English) is the default locale and its JSON files are stored in 'i18n/en/docusaurus-theme-classic/'. These are copied to the target locale's folder for translation.

Site-level translation JSON file (code.json). This pattern assumes 'en' (English) is the default locale and its 'code.json' is stored in 'i18n/en/'. This file is copied to the target locale's folder for translation.
